verses.name: Leviticus 13:34
verses.text: And in the seventh day the priest shall look on the scall: and, behold, if the scall be not spread in the skin, nor be in sight deeper than the skin; then the priest shall pronounce him clean: and he shall wash his clothes, and be clean.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:35
verses.text: But if the scall spread much in the skin after his cleansing;

verses.name: Leviticus 13:36
verses.text: Then the priest shall look on him: and, behold, if the scall be spread in the skin, the priest shall not seek for yellow hair; he is unclean.
